data.title: Joshua Independent School District
data.text:
Excellence...For All...From All

Join us in congratulating Hattie Roberts for being named one of the six finalists for the Region 11 Elementary Teacher of the Year award!

OWL Camp is on the non-instruction Mondays on the 2024-25 calendar.

Cole Anderson, Jaedon Cox, Jaxon Dial and Kaitlyn Tyk earned this distinction after qualifying for the State Academic UIL Competition this past school year.

Congratulations to Joshua FFA students Abigail Bryant, Presley Jordan, Ellie Kindler, Payton Long, Kylie McKinney and Jadon Welman who received their Texas FFA Lonestar Degrees this week!

August 8 is the first day of school!

After a spectacular performance at the 17th State Lineman Challenge, the Joshua Owls linemen have earned the title of State Champions!

After an impressive year on the diamond and in the classroom, the Joshua High School Lady Owls softball team has earned many District 8-5A awards!
